name: Deadly Curse
description: Deadly Curse is placing you in the midst of an action-packed adventure game where you are in control. You enter a mental hospital where doctors are experimenting on patients unlike never before. A priest is here to help the doctors without knowing the stuff they do to those patients.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD FX-8320 @3.5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670K @3.4 GHz / AMD FX-8350 @4.0 GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
